english_example_sentence: If I report the urgent situation to the manager, a solution will be found immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если я сообщу об экстренной ситуации менеджеру, решение будет найдено немедленно.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer acil durumu müdüre bildirsem, hemen çözüm bulunur.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eğer acil durumu müdüre ______, hemen çözüm bulunur.
